title: Understanding the $$3$$ T's
text: The model of the $$3$$ T's is a framework that emphasizes three key components necessary for effective ethical decision-making and organizational success. Think about what foundational elements are crucial for building a strong ethical culture.

title: Tools
text: Refers to resources, software, and equipment needed to perform tasks efficiently

title: Training
text: Refers to how users can learn to leverage tools

title: Trust
text: Crucial for elaboration and decision making

title: Transport
text: The movement of different objects in a workplace, but not related to models

title: Trying
text: Relates to effort, which is good except does not work without other key components

title: Transforming
text: Is vague and does not discuss any learning

title: Talent
text: Skills you are very strong in
